text: Gregory Michael "Greg" Cipes (born January 4, 1980) is an American actor, voice artist and singer. He has performed in many movies (including The Wild as the voice of Ryan). He has performed in television programs, such as Teen Titans as Beast Boy. He was born in Coral Springs, Florida. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Florida
title: Greg Cipes
